name: Dongmin is Tom
review: this place is so nice and show nice view  when on season  i think it will be hard to park in here  you guys should visit 2 places on here  light house and wooden gazebo

name: Kyle Haney
review: amazing scenery and views  definitely worth the trip if near yangyang or sokcho and need of a short hike

name: Charles
review: i walked from my rental  beautiful spot  i went in the rain and was the only person out  it s a short walk but would highly recommend for the scenery

name: Karen Laurico
review: this is an amazing place to visit in south korea  the place is refreshing to the body and mind because of its cool atmosphere  the view is also spectacular and pleasing to the eyes  best place to relax while sipping a hot coffee or chocolate in their traditional coffee shop  a must visit place

name: Yazhini Venugopal
review: nice sea view and early evening sky is beautiful here

name: michaella gotlieb
review: beautiful view of the japan sea and nature  has a little korean temple to sit in and a light house on the other side of the place

name: Ha Eun Kim
review: i love the place   stress free    very nice place you must visit

name: O&M Olson
review: beautiful scenery and rocky shore scapes   a bit strange surrounding area with surveillance and fences but the view was great

name: June Lee
review: beautiful lighthouse observatory  you will appreciate such a fantastic ocean view from here   in a 5minute walk away from here there is an old  pavilion   one local man told me that s the hot spot to see the sunrise  many people come up here to see the first sunrise on the first day of the new year   it s a quite pleasure to walk along the trail while you re enjoying the ocean view

name: Dan G
review: beautiful view of the sea  worth stopping

name: Jun Yoon
review: the classic view of pine trees on rocks braving the waves was simply breathtaking

name: Michael Kim
review: so cool

name: Sukanya Ghosh
review: one must go to this place when they are visiting gangwondo to see the beautiful blue ocean and the surrounding rocky cliffs just adds on to the beauty the place shuts by 6

name: Harrison Yi
review: good place to all in 4 season

name: Jongwook Woo
review: must come see place of the east coast of korea  stunning scene of east sea  rock cliffs and pine trees which u can approach easily by car

name: Jay Song
review: an old hang out place for two friends ha something and jo something i forgot now  pretty place with a 200 year old pine tree  difficult to park

name: Tam Chung
review: beautiful scenery of korea s east coast

name: Hyun Jun Kim
review: beautiful place to see the ocean  the pine tree is the best

name: Jihwan Kim (Ethan)
review: perfect place to see the sunrise

review: nice place to walk parking possible
